Event.Text:
Something we encountered back there must have hit and punctured our oxygen tank.
Miles was the first to notice and Kate managed to cover it with duct-tape.
The repairs are too much, and oxygen is leaking at a constant rate. Doing a quick calculation, Meg found that there is only enough oxygen for 5 people to make it to the sister base.

Choice.Text: Send an emergency distress signal and keep driving, in the hope that somebody from the base finds you first.
Set the rover to autopilot, and slow our metabolism hoping we can conserve enough oxygen for the trip.
{Trigger Happy} Kill one comrade to save the rest.
